divs: Sighting DetailsSaw this starlike orb in mid daylight. Hovering. When jet passenger plane came in shot up then descended. Red orb like object. 3rd sighting in last year of this. Last time had out of body dream that night. Will report if happens again
Summary: Saw star like object. 3rd sighting I last 2 years. They hover. This had a appendage circling when observed through binocs
